title: How long does it take riot support to respond to tickets
body: I sent a ticket earlier this day and I was wondering how long it takes riot support to respond. Sorry if I am acting impatient I just really want the RP that I accidentally added to the wrong account, for the arcade event and skins.

replies.body: It can take a varying amount of time for our agents to respond to those tickets depending on the current size of their queues. I do see your ticket now, and it shouldn't be long for that response!
thank you sorry if i sounded rude i just want to try the new content :D
